FileFormat.FormatDescription: PEA (an acronym of Pack Encrypt Authenticate) is the native format of PeaZip, an open source file archiver created by Giorgio Tani.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF: Magic 0xEA, 9 bytes include major/minor version which may be desirable to distinguish in the future. Stream Header 0x0000 'POD' 0x00 https://hwiegman.home.xs4all.nl/fileformats/pea/pea_file_format.pdf
